Keywords: Annihilators , Cosmic , Imperial Guard , Shi'ar , Soldier
Real Name: Kallark
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Destroy Blocking
I GROW STRONGER AS YOU GET WEAKER: Gladiator starts the game on click #4. // Steal Energy, but with close or range attacks. When Gladiator uses Steal Energy, he may heal past his starting line.
MY CONFIDENCE IS MY STRENGTH: Flurry. Charge, but do not halve speed.
PRAETOR OF THE IMPERIAL GUARD: Leadership, Close Combat Expert.

Comments
February 23, 2022
Thor64
Agreed. Gladiator, in my games as well, has singlehandedly determined the outcome of my battles. Between his Steal Energy, full Charge, Flurry and devastating 5 Damage, he's a force to be reckoned with.
November 27, 2021
jcintro
W/L Record: 4-0. Gladiator, when positioned properly, can really do some work. Getting him on to click 3 will really get things going. Getting to click 2 is icing on the cake, and all bets are off when he reaches click 1. Gladiator has singlehandedly swayed the outcome of several of my games that I played him in because of his traited Steal Energy. Throw in some cheap Empowers (which is very much available to figs with the Shiar keyword), and Gladiator will be dishing out some serious damage. I'm glad that Wizkids finally got it right with this figure.
November 21, 2021
fastcat99
He seems built for the Waldo Arms!
October 19, 2021
vamroc
Wish he had the Martial Arts keyword like previous versions
July 5, 2021
Geof-Force
This is way too good for 90 points. Heck, it's way too good for 150 points.
June 24, 2021
Goop
Click 3 is definitely the sweet spot. Charge flurry with CCE and steal energy will likely take you to your top click. With traited steal energy and so much flurry on the dial this guy will bring a TON of damage and also be hard to kill.
June 19, 2021
Redrover454
Running Shot - Pen/Psych to heal onto click 3, and then next turn pick an easy target with your full speed charge and flurry on them to heal onto that godly click #1. When played properly, a very hard to KO 90 points that should have no problem bringing in the victory points while he's out there. Just take advantage of some TK and his IM:Blocking to make sure he doesn't get sniped onto flurry.
June 19, 2021
jtallday
Man I already love this guy. Vamps never seem to be good enough for competitive but he looks fun.
